sentences.en: He reached the garden gate and thrust his way through it.
sentences.cn: 他来到花园门口，挤了进去。

sentences.en: He slammed the gate shut behind him.
sentences.cn: 他砰的一声带上了大门。

sentences.en: He stood mournfully at the gate waving bye bye.
sentences.cn: 他伤心地站在门口，挥手告别。

sentences.en: Just make sure you shut the gate after you.
PC Keith Gate helped arrest the men.
sentences.cn: 警员基思·盖特协助逮捕了那些人。

sentences.en: She ran swiftly over the lawn to the gate.
sentences.cn: 她一溜烟穿过草地跑到了大门口。

sentences.en: The car swept past the gate house.
The name on the gate pulled me up short.
sentences.cn: 大门上的名字让我突然停了下来。

sentences.en: the wrought-iron gates of the palace
Their average gate is less than 23,000.
sentences.cn: 他们的平均上座率不到23,000人。

sentences.en: There's a man at the gate asking for you.
They stopped to lean over a gate.
sentences.cn: 他们停下来，趴在一扇大门前。

sentences.en: They used a lorry to ram the main gate.
We gave the gate money to the St John Ambulance brigade.
sentences.cn: 我们将门票收入都捐给了圣约翰急救队。

sentences.en: We slammed the gate after them, wedging it shut with planks.
sentences.cn: 他们出去后，我们在后面砰地把大门关上，并用板条抵死。

sentences.en: We went through the gate into the orchard.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过大门进了果园。

sentences.en: You left the latch off the gate and the dog escaped.
sentences.cn: 你没把门闩插上，所以狗跑了。

words.tran_cn: 给…安装门；用门控制（gate的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 闸门开启高度；导叶开度
正门，大门；主电闸；主选择脉冲
南盖特（美国加利福尼亚州西南部城市）

trans.tran_en: the part of a fence or outside wall that you can open and close so that you can enter or leave a place
to provide with a gate or gates
